programme.title: Around the World in 80 Gardens
programme.desc: Monty Don continues his journey with a visit to the richest and most powerful nation in the world: the United States of America. There, he meets garden guerrillas in New York, visits a Virginian garden that reflects the birth of the nation, and finally travels west to California, to see if gardens there reflect more than the glitz of the movie industry.

programme.title: Pavarotti Masterclass
programme.desc: Italian superstar Luciano Pavarotti plays coach to four young singers, giving them a short masterclass in the skills he has learned from a life in opera.

programme.title: Strauss: The Waltz King
programme.desc: The original dirty dancing became a century-long craze, but behind it was a bitter tale of father and son rivalry. Lesley Garrett narrates this drama documentary, steps onto the dance floor - and even tries on the period underwear. The compelling story is illustrated with the music of the time, played by the Wiener Akademie orchestra in Viennas sumptuous Hofburg Palace.

programme.title: Reputations
programme.sub-title: Dr. Martin Luther King - Days of Hope
programme.desc: Dr Martin Luther King has been immortalised as one of the great champions of civil rights and non-violent protest. But in the years since his assassination, a more complex picture of his personality has emerged. Drawing on interviews with the people he knew, this film reveals that King was never comfortable with the praises he received and was often tormented by self-doubt.

programme.title: Face to Face
programme.desc: Martin Luther King talks about his childhood experiences and the incidents that led to the Montgomery bus boycott. These events shaped Kings life and led to him becoming a national figurehead and civil rights leader.

programme.title: Timeshift
programme.desc: To mark the fiftieth anniversary of the Severn Bridge, Timeshift tells the inside story of the design and construction of the most perfect suspension bridge in the world, and how its unique slim-line structure arose by accident.

programme.title: Munro: Mountain Man
programme.desc: Little more than 100 years ago, Scottish mountains standing at more than 3,000 feet were virtually unknown. Today they are familiar terrain to many thousands of climbers, thanks to Victorian adventurer Hugh Munros determination to list the high peaks which now define the Highlands and Islands of Scotland. Nicholas Crane tells the story of the magnificent peaks that bear his name.

programme.title: Wallace and Gromit in The Curse of the Were-Rabbit
programme.desc: The village is being overrun by rabbits and Wallace has a plan to alter their minds so that they will leave the vegetable allotments alone. However, his plan goes awry and the rabbit problem escalates when the villagers discover a monstrous `were-rabbit destroying everything in its sights. Will Wallace and Gromit be able to solve the conundrum before the creature gets shot?

programme.title: Planet Earth Live
programme.desc: Sam, Sophie and Sybil are three tiny black bear cubs who have just emerged from their den in the Northwoods of Minnesota. But this spectacular wilderness is full of threats, wolves and coyotes roam the forest looking for stray cubs, the weather can be dangerously unpredictable bringing blizzards and forest fires, and every year some of the black bears are killed by humans. Their survival depends entirely on the experience of their mother and how well they learn the skills she teaches them.

programme.title: Dynasties
programme.desc: High in the mountains of Morocco lives a descendant of a long line of macaque rulers. She has been in charge of this troupe for many winters - one of the longest recorded reigns of an alpha - but this year is likely to be her last.

programme.title: Hamzas Hidden Wild Isles

programme.title: Strictly Come Dancing

Two more couples must take on the dreaded dance-off - who wont be cast a role in the next show?

programme.title: Crimewatch Live

programme.title: Homes Under the Hammer
programme.desc: Martin is in Warwickshire to see a property above a former brewery with a quirky layout and a holey roof. Dion heads to Staffordshire to visit a three-bed mid-terrace with a huge back garden boasting elevated views over Stoke-on-Trent. And we return to Nottinghamshire to find out how the story ends for a couple who bought a former farm building at auction and planned to turn it into their forever home.

programme.title: Bargain Hunt

programme.title: Lost and Found in the Lakes
programme.desc: The intrepid Lost and Found team take on a desperate search to find two beloved rings. A local crafter is challenged to transform abandoned scrap, giving it a new lease of life. After a valuable chance find during one of their underwater searches, social media detective Mui tries to track down the owner.

programme.title: Escape to the Country
programme.desc: Emotions are running high during a house hunt in Herefordshire, where Sonali Shah is helping a couple to make a fresh start in the countryside after a life-changing event.

programme.title: The Repair Shop
programme.desc: Confronted with a contraption that has clearly seen better days, a daunted Dominic Chinea is taking on the barns first assignment. All the way from Scotland, brothers Lewis and Ross have wheeled in their familys mobile ice cream trailer. Keen to share the inside scoop on the family business, they reveal that theyve been serving up gelato in St Andrews, Fife since 1908 when their great-great-grandfather came over from Italy and started selling the yummy stuff from a shop in the centre of town.

programme.title: The Inner Circle
programme.desc: Amanda Holden hosts the quiz, packed with strategy, high stakes and surprises, where players must outsmart each other to win big. Six players are each randomly assigned a secret stash of cash - anything between zero and a whopping £4,000.

programme.title: Pointless
programme.desc: Alexander Armstrong is joined by co-host Trevor Nelson for the brainy quiz where the contestants try to score as few points as possible by plumbing the depths of their general knowledge to come up with the answers no-one else could think of.

programme.title: Take a Hike
programme.desc: Its the final day of the north west Wales walks. Last to lead is 55-year-old Piers, who lives in Llandudno. His creative, fun-filled walk starts at Nefyn beach, where the walkers trace the coastline along sandy beaches and lush headlands.

programme.title: Glorious Gardens From Above
programme.desc: Christine heads to Powis Castle Garden, where she learns how to brace an ancient yew, and visits Dingle Garden, where she helps restore an obscured view.

programme.title: Weatherman Walking

programme.title: Landward
programme.desc: Dougie and the team look at how crofting continues across areas of the Highlands and Islands. Meanwhile, Anne lends a hand on shearing day in Harris and meets a crofter of the future.

programme.title: Saturday Kitchen Best Bites
programme.desc: An array of delicious dishes from Anna Haugh, Mike Reid, Nadiya Hussain and Bryn Williams. And we head out across the UK with Rick Stein and the Hairy Bikers.

programme.title: Nadiyas British Food Adventure
programme.desc: Nadiya heads to the Peak District and surrounding areas in search of people who are preserving old culinary traditions. Before she leaves, shecooks her version of the areas famous dish, the bakewell tart.

programme.desc: The Squirrels are playing dress up when they hear a ghostly sound. They can see that something has spooked the chickens, so they stop what they are doing to investigate. They come across several different items, such as ghostly white footprints.

programme.desc: When Bingo finds a walking leaf insect in the garden while playing a game with Bluey and dad, she gets upset when dad is too caught up in the game to notice.

programme.desc: Emilios family are from Cyprus, an island nation in the Mediterranean Sea. Emilio is making two Cypriot recipes for his friends to enjoy. The first is pitta bread! The dough is formed and rolled into ovals and placed on a baking tray.

programme.title: Andys Aquatic Adventures
programme.desc: Mr Hammond is giving one of his special wildlife talks at Safari World. This one is all about a seabird called a sooty tern. Jen has deployed one of her remote-controlled bird-cams to a small island in the Indian Ocean.

programme.title: Ranger Hamzas Eco Quest

programme.title: Steve and Aneeshwar Go Wild
programme.desc: Steve and Aneeshwar meet some agile gibbons who show them how well they can move. Though the gibbons are a little quiet, Steve and Aneeshwar have a go at showing what they sound like in the wild. Next, they meet a tall, long-legged bird called a seriema who is very interested in a pretend toy snake, before they reveal the unusual wild connection between the two animals.

programme.title: Dodges Pup School
programme.desc: Following Dodge at Pup School, a place full of mishaps and mayhem. Dodge and his pup pals turn school days into adventures with singing, silliness, and occasional squeaky toys.

programme.title: Octonauts

programme.title: Vida the Vet

programme.title: Go Jetters
programme.desc: Lars sees a mysterious creature near the Academy jungle and rushes to tell the others. Ubercorn explains that new species are discovered all the time, so this could be something that no one has seen before. He also tells them that new species are often named after the person who finds them. programme.desc: Ania Magliano asks a stranger about their marital status, Phil Ellis strips to his base layer and Reece Shearsmith destroys a valuable ornament. Throughout it all, Greg Davies expertly maintains order with his usual stern authority.

programme.title: The Great British Bake Off: An Extra Slice
programme.desc: Alison Hammond, Jonathan Ross and Joe Thomas digest Pastry Week. Whose Technical got pied, and whose Signature plaits had the judges tongue-tied?

programme.title: Mitchell and Webb Are Not Helping
programme.desc: The real cause of climate change? Its good news and bad news. Plus: TVs most wholesome heirloom repair show. A death in the Sweary Aussie family. And the lawyers intervene in the writers room.

programme.title: Ramsays Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: Gordon Ramsay tries to improve the family-run Fiesta Sunrise, a Mexican restaurant in West Nyack, N.Y., with a cockroach-infested kitchen.

programme.title: Ayena
programme.desc: Explores the unusual friendship of two young women as they re-adjust in the aftermath of a vicious acid attack on them.

programme.title: Ashoka
programme.desc: A chronicle of the early part of the life of emperor Asoka, beginning with his career as a general in Taxila, a modern-day Russia.

programme.title: Chori Mera Kaam
programme.desc: A petty thief who works with a female accomplice stumbles upon a nationwide best selling manuscript that reveals all the truth about his own life.

programme.title: Shimla Mirchi
programme.desc: A man under the spell of love decides to stay back and start working at the place he had come down for a vacation.

programme.title: Dear Zindagi
programme.desc: An unconventional thinker helps a budding cinematographer gain a new perspective on life.

programme.title: Love Aaj Kal
programme.desc: Two lovers who dont believe in tying each other down have a mutual breakup when career comes calling. Despite moving on, they realise they long for each other.

programme.title: Rocky Aur Rani Kii Prem Kahaani
programme.desc: Flamboyant Punjabi Rocky and intellectual Bengali journalist Rani fall in love despite their differences. After facing family opposition, they decide to live with each others families for three months before getting married.

programme.title: Jab We Met
programme.desc: Aditya is a business scion whose life is going all wrong. Geet is a bubbly girl who couldnt care less about life. Fate brings them together on a life-changing journey.

programme.title: Halla Bol
programme.desc: A self-centred, manipulative and arrogant Bollywood actor witnesses a murder committed by the sons of a government minister but decides to stay silent.

programme.title: Pankh
programme.desc: Film highlighting a phenomenon peculiar and exclusive to the Indian film industry, the practise of casting children in roles opposite to their natural genders.

programme.title: Dhaakad Beera
programme.desc: With courage as his superpower, eight-year-old Samrat becomes a one-man army for his baby sister Kishmishs right to live in a world ruled by cruel conventions he doesnt understand.

programme.desc: Lord Shiva and his wife, the Goddess Parvati, navigate their relationship and duties whilst offering sacrifices in their mission to care for humanity.

programme.title: Most Ridiculous
programme.desc: A compilation of videos that have gone viral, in which various individuals show how far they are able to go to achieve the most absurd things and achieve the ultimate in ridiculousness.

programme.title: Bradley and Barney Walsh: Breaking Dad
programme.desc: Bradley and Barney continue their European adventure in Poland. The boys take in a spot of sightseeing in Krakow, before they don wetsuits and head to a freezing cold lake to try out water blobbing. Next up, they come face to face with mans best friend as Brad gets chased by an attack dog. All before Barney treats his dad to an exclusive performance with the Polish National Radio Symphony Orchestra in honour of Polands most famous composer, Chopin.

programme.title: Bradley and Barney Walsh: Breaking Dad
programme.desc: Bradley and Barney arrive in Denmark for the Scandinavian leg of their tour. Bradleys fear of heights is pushed to the limit with a visit to an offshore wind turbine, and the boys test both of their boundaries with a visit to the worlds tallest indoor rope course.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One Where It All Began
programme.desc: An introduction to the gang. After Rachel leaves her Mr Potato Head look-alike fiance Barry at the altar, she moves in with Monica and discovers that independence sucks when you dont have Daddys credit cards to rely on. Meanwhile, Chandler and Joey encourage Ross to experience the advantages of bachelorhood, and Phoebe supports herself by playing guitar in the subway.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With the Sonogram at the End
programme.desc: Rosss lesbian ex-wife is pregnant with his child and he doesnt like her choice of last name for the baby. Elsewhere, Rachel finds out that her ex-fiance went on what would have been their honeymoon with her maid of honour.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Monica finds it difficult to break up with her latest boyfriend whom everyone likes, Chandler is reunited with his beloved cigarettes, and Phoebe receives a large sum of money.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: While the men attend a hockey game and end up at a hospital, the women spy on President Clintons top aide, George Stephanopoulos, who lives across the street. Meanwhile, Rachel receives her first pay packet.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With the East German Laundry Detergent
programme.desc: While Chandler and Phoebe decide to break up with their significant others on the same night, Ross and Rachel have their first date doing laundry together.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: An agent offers Joey a movie role as Al Pacinos naked body double, Ross tries to be less conservative, and Chandler thinks his fantasies have come true when he has an affair with a married woman.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: A power cut leaves Chandler stranded in a bank with a gorgeous woman, Ross tries to ask Rachel out on a date, and Joey learns that Monica used to be infatuated with him.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One Where Nana Dies Twice
programme.desc: Monica and Ross mourn the death of their grandmother with a little help from the gang, and Monica and her mum come to an unspoken understanding about the relationship between mothers and daughters. Meanwhile, Chandler is irritated by office speculation that he is gay.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One Where Underdog Gets Away
programme.desc: Monicas first Thanksgiving dinner for the gang goes horribly wrong when they all get locked on the roof after watching a giant runaway balloon from the New York Thanksgiving parade. Elsewhere, Joey wins his first modelling gig as the poster boy for a venereal disease campaign, and Ross competes with his ex-wife to communicate with their unborn baby.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: As New Year approaches, the gang make a pact to celebrate at Monica and Rachels flat without bringing any dates. However, as the New Year gets closer, all of them find themselves breaking that promise except for Ross, who brings along his new pet monkey Marcel.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Chandlers flamboyant mother visits New York, while Phoebe and Monica flirt with a handsome stranger while crossing a road and end up causing a traffic accident.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One with the Dozen Lasagnes
programme.desc: Rachels Italian boyfriend tries to seduce Phoebe, Rachel accidentally reveals a secret to Ross, and Monicas aunt refuses to take the lasagnes she ordered.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Chandler sees Rachel nude, and Joey learns that his father is having an affair.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With the Candy Hearts
programme.desc: Its Valentines Day and, out on his first date in nine years, Ross meets up with his ex-wife. Meanwhile, Monica, Phoebe and Rachel rebel against the spirit of the day by burning mementos of past relationships.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With the Stoned Guy
programme.desc: The owner of a fancy restaurant where Monica applies for the chefs position is a little high on illicit substances when he tries the gourmet feast she prepares for him.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Phoebe doesnt get on with her identical twin Ursula. Unfortunately, no one can tell them apart, which leads to a few cases of mistaken identity, not least for Joey who is quite taken with Ursula.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: After weeks of procrastinating, Rachel finally takes down the Christmas lights, but sprains her ankle.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With All the Poker
programme.desc: When the girls lose money to the guys in a poker match they seek out Monicas Aunt Iris, a famous card player, for lessons in poker and demand a rematch.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One Where the Monkey Gets Away
programme.desc: Rachel accidentally lets Ross pet monkey escape, and the friends form a search party. She is then horrified to learn that her former best friend is engaged to marry her ex-fiance.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With the Evil Orthodontist
programme.desc: Rachel gets back together with her ex-fiance Barry, even though hes engaged to her best friend Mindy. Meanwhile, Chandler agonises over a wonderful woman who fails to call him after their first date.

programme.title: St Trinians 2: The Legend of Frittons Gold
programme.desc: The boarding schools anarchic female students discover newly appointed head girl Annabelle Fritton had a 16-century nautical ancestor who acquired a rather large treasure trove on the high seas. The girls have one of the keys to finding its location, but also determinedly on trail of the Spanish loot is the devious and amoral Sir Piers Pomfrey, who is not alone in his desire to stop them.

programme.title: Lee Evans Live: The Different Planet Tour
programme.desc: Lee Evans took his show on a 114 date tour across 63 different towns, finally returning to the West End for one more performance.

programme.title: Lee Evans: Live in Scotland
programme.desc: The side-splitting grand finale of Lee Evans 100 date sell-out UK tour at the Edinburgh Playhouse.

programme.title: Iain Stirlings Roast The Internet
programme.sub-title: Jon Richardson, Ellie Taylor and Fatiha El-Ghorri
programme.desc: ...Internet. Host Iain Stirling is joined by Jon Richardson, Ellie Taylor and Fatiha El-Ghorri for a scathing takedown of pure internet madness, from awkward influencers to social media fails. (S1, E06)

programme.title: Whose Line Is It Anyway? USA
programme.desc: Three Little Pigs gets a sleazy reality TV twist in Hollywood Director.

programme.title: Whose Line Is It Anyway? USA
programme.desc: TV and movie star Alyson Hannigan joins for a laughter-packed show.

programme.title: Important Things With Demetri Martin
programme.desc: Demetri focuses his sketches around the idea of money, including a run-through of the new words concerning money, a song about cash and a skit about cashpoints.

programme.title: The Ricky Gervais Show
programme.desc: Karl imagines what life would be like if he had a doppelganger. Meanwhile, Ricky poses a logic riddle that Karl has difficulty solving and Stephen shares some embarrassing anecdotes from a recent trip to Rio de Janeiro. Entries from Karls Diary include his difficulty understanding art, why he hates Rickys cat and when medical science goes too far.

programme.title: The Ricky Gervais Show
programme.desc: Ricky teaches Karl some facts about animals, Karl offers a misguided theory about evolution, then recounts the latest scientific breakthroughs in medicine, and Stephen reads from Karls Diary, sharing his thoughts about the Congo, the decline of gadgets and watching films with subtitles.

programme.desc: Chandlers flamboyant mother visits New York, while Phoebe and Monica flirt with a handsome stranger while crossing a road and end up causing a traffic accident.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One with the Dozen Lasagnes
programme.desc: Rachels Italian boyfriend tries to seduce Phoebe, Rachel accidentally reveals a secret to Ross, and Monicas aunt refuses to take the lasagnes she ordered.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Chandler sees Rachel nude, and Joey learns that his father is having an affair.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With the Candy Hearts
programme.desc: Its Valentines Day and, out on his first date in nine years, Ross meets up with his ex-wife. Meanwhile, Monica, Phoebe and Rachel rebel against the spirit of the day by burning mementos of past relationships.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With the Stoned Guy
programme.desc: The owner of a fancy restaurant where Monica applies for the chefs position is a little high on illicit substances when he tries the gourmet feast she prepares for him.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Phoebe doesnt get on with her identical twin Ursula. Unfortunately, no one can tell them apart, which leads to a few cases of mistaken identity, not least for Joey who is quite taken with Ursula.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: After weeks of procrastinating, Rachel finally takes down the Christmas lights, but sprains her ankle.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With All the Poker
programme.desc: When the girls lose money to the guys in a poker match they seek out Monicas Aunt Iris, a famous card player, for lessons in poker and demand a rematch.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One Where the Monkey Gets Away
programme.desc: Rachel accidentally lets Ross pet monkey escape, and the friends form a search party. She is then horrified to learn that her former best friend is engaged to marry her ex-fiance.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With the Evil Orthodontist
programme.desc: Rachel gets back together with her ex-fiance Barry, even though hes engaged to her best friend Mindy. Meanwhile, Chandler agonises over a wonderful woman who fails to call him after their first date.

programme.title: St Trinians 2: The Legend of Frittons Gold
programme.desc: The boarding schools anarchic female students discover newly appointed head girl Annabelle Fritton had a 16-century nautical ancestor who acquired a rather large treasure trove on the high seas. The girls have one of the keys to finding its location, but also determinedly on trail of the Spanish loot is the devious and amoral Sir Piers Pomfrey, who is not alone in his desire to stop them.

programme.title: Lee Evans Live: The Different Planet Tour
programme.desc: Lee Evans took his show on a 114 date tour across 63 different towns, finally returning to the West End for one more performance.

programme.title: Lee Evans: Live in Scotland
programme.desc: The side-splitting grand finale of Lee Evans 100 date sell-out UK tour at the Edinburgh Playhouse.

programme.title: Iain Stirlings Roast The Internet
programme.sub-title: Jon Richardson, Ellie Taylor and Fatiha El-Ghorri
programme.desc: ...Internet. Host Iain Stirling is joined by Jon Richardson, Ellie Taylor and Fatiha El-Ghorri for a scathing takedown of pure internet madness, from awkward influencers to social media fails. (S1, E06)

programme.title: Whose Line Is It Anyway? USA
programme.desc: Three Little Pigs gets a sleazy reality TV twist in Hollywood Director.

programme.title: Whose Line Is It Anyway? USA

programme.title: Important Things With Demetri Martin
programme.desc: Demetri focuses his sketches around the idea of money, including a run-through of the new words concerning money, a song about cash and a skit about cashpoints.

programme.title: The Ricky Gervais Show
programme.desc: Karl imagines what life would be like if he had a doppelganger. Meanwhile, Ricky poses a logic riddle that Karl has difficulty solving and Stephen shares some embarrassing anecdotes from a recent trip to Rio de Janeiro. Entries from Karls Diary include his difficulty understanding art, why he hates Rickys cat and when medical science goes too far.

programme.title: The Ricky Gervais Show

programme.title: Gold Rush
programme.desc: The boys are back in Alaska (although Discovery dropped the states mention in the title after the first season) hoping to strike it rich mining for gold. Their first effort was anything but rich and glorious, however, as the crew led by Todd Hoffman and his father, Jack, sunk $250,000 into their dream and came away with just $20,000 worth of gold. The dismal summer was filled with injuries, malfunctioning equipment and constant fighting among the greenhorn miners, yet their serious case of gold fever trumps any talk of giving up and leads to a new operating plan in order to salvage their dream. The series also keeps tabs on the efforts of teenager Parker Schnabel and old-timer Dakota Fred to hit the mother lode at separate sites.

programme.title: Teen Mom OG
programme.desc: For four seasons fans of `Teen Mom watched Farrah, Maci, Amber and Catelynn face multiple challenges in their first years of motherhood, including such things as graduating from high school, relationships, getting jobs, beginning college and moving out on their own. Oh, and raising their first child. Now the original girls - hence, the `OG in the revived series title - return to reveal the challenges of raising children on camera, and how life in the public eye has shaped them as parents and people. Its an unprecedented view of young mothers facing the responsibilities of parenthood as their children enter kindergarten, start little league and reach other milestones of youth.

programme.title: Teen Mom OG
programme.desc: For four seasons fans of `Teen Mom watched Farrah, Maci, Amber and Catelynn face multiple challenges in their first years of motherhood, including such things as graduating from high school, relationships, getting jobs, beginning college and moving out on their own. Oh, and raising their first child. Now the original girls - hence, the `OG in the revived series title - return to reveal the challenges of raising children on camera, and how life in the public eye has shaped them as parents and people. Its an unprecedented view of young mothers facing the responsibilities of parenthood as their children enter kindergarten, start little league and reach other milestones of youth.

programme.title: Andre Rieu at Schonbrunn, Vienna
programme.desc: Accompanied by the Johann Strauss Orchestra, world renowned violinist Andre Rieu performs numbers including Roses from the South, and Emperors Waltz at Schonbrunn in Vienna.

programme.title: Cats
programme.desc: A performance of Andrew Lloyd Webbers long-running musical `Cats, filmed at Londons Adelphi Theatre.

programme.title: Johnny Cash: A Night to Remember

programme.title: The Yardbirds
programme.desc: The story of five incredible years, 1963-1968, which saw The Yardbirds go from a relatively small-time suburban blues outfit to one of the most respected rock bands in history.

programme.title: Bryan Adams: Live at Royal Albert Hall May 2024
programme.desc: Bryan Adams takes to the stage at Londons iconic Royal Albert Hall to perform his classic album Reckless.

programme.title: Led Zeppelin: In the Light
programme.desc: Fourth and final part of the definitive critical review of the music of one of historys most influential rock bands, Led Zeppelin, on stage, on record and on film. (4 of 4)

programme.title: Black Sabbath: Paranoid (Classic Album)
programme.desc: Black Sabbaths second album featured the hit songs `War Pigs, Iron Man and of course the title track. This is the story behind how this legendary heavy metal album came to be.

programme.title: Enter the Dragon

programme.title: Sky Cinema Preview
programme.desc: Previews of the great films now playing on Sky Cinema plus other highlights showing on Sky.

programme.title: The Green Hornet
programme.desc: The heir to a newspaper fortune joins forces with a resourceful company employee to try to bring a powerful Los Angeles crime lord to justice.

programme.title: The Cinema List: Jurassic
programme.desc: Welcome to a Cinema List 65 million years in the making, going through the very best moments from the Jurassic franchise - from the 1993 original to `Jurassic World: Dominion.

programme.title: Green Lantern
programme.desc: A test pilot is granted a mystical green ring that bestows him with otherworldly powers, as well as membership into an intergalactic squadron tasked with keeping peace within the universe. Based on DC Comics characters.

programme.title: Hellboy
programme.desc: Though the Nazis fail to open the gates of Hell, one little devil gets through. Raised at a secret FBI lab, Hellboy is a cigar-chomping, crimson demon with a breezeblock for a right hand and a gift for fighting otherworldly beasts. Lively action fantasy based on the cult comic book.

programme.title: Vendetta
programme.desc: When his daughter is brutally murdered and legal justice looks unlikely, William Duncan takes the law into his own hands, setting out on a quest for retribution.

programme.title: Baby Driver
programme.desc: Baby, a music-loving orphan also happens to be the prodigiously talented go-to getaway driver for heist mastermind Doc. With the perfect soundtrack picked out for each and every job, Baby ensures Docs violent, bank-robbing cronies - including Buddy, Bats and Darling - get in and out of Dodge before its too late. Hes not in it for the long haul though, hoping to nail one last job before riding off into the sunset with beautiful diner waitress Debora. Easier said than done.

programme.title: The Mummy
programme.desc: The curse of an ancient mummy protects buried treasure in the Egyptian desert. An American mercenary who knows of the secret location is rescued from a Cairo prison by an English historian and her brother, and together they set off on a hunt. Along the way, the trio encounter flesh-eating scarab beetles, killer sandstorms, and reincarnated demons.

programme.title: The Mummy Returns
programme.desc: The evil mummy Imhotep returns to wreak havoc as he resumes his relentless search for power and immortality. To make matters worse, another ancient evil has been unleashed, even more dangerous than Imhotep. Only the heroic Rick OConnell and his intrepid Egyptologist wife stand in the way of these twin terrors as they embark upon a desperate mission to save the world.

programme.title: Raiders of the Lost Ark
programme.desc: Epic tale in which an intrepid archaeologist tries to beat a band of Nazis to a unique religious relic which is central to their plans for world domination. Battling against a snake phobia and a vengeful ex-girlfriend, Indiana Jones is in constant peril, making hairs-breadth escapes at every turn in this celebration of the innocent adventure movies of an earlier era.

programme.title: Indiana Jones and the Temple of Doom
programme.desc: Adventure sequel. Intrepid archaeologist Indiana Jones, on the trail of fortune and glory in Old Shanghai, is ricocheted into a dangerous adventure in India. With his faithful companion Short Round and nightclub singer Willie Scott, Indie goes in search of the magical Sankara stone, and uncovers an ancient evil which threatens all who come into contact with it.

programme.title: Crank
programme.desc: An ex-hit man is injected with a mysterious cocktail of drugs by his arch-rival that will kill him if his heart rate drops below a certain level. Hurtling through a succession of sex and violence in order to keep his pulse rate up, he must seek revenge and keep himself and his girlfriend alive.

programme.title: Seeking Justice
programme.desc: Quiet teacher Will Gerard is sucked into a world of vigilantism when his wife Laura is brutally attacked.

programme.title: Pompeii
programme.desc: As Mount Vesuvius rains down lava and ash, a gladiator (Kit Harington) races to save the woman (Emily Browning) he loves before the city collapses.

programme.title: Enter the Dragon
programme.desc: A kung fu expert is assigned to penetrate an island fortress to destroy an opium and white slavery empire.

programme.title: Pompeii

programme.title: LEGO DC Super Heroes: The Flash
programme.desc: Reverse-Flash manipulates the Speed Force to put The Flash into a time loop, which forces him to re-live the same day over and over again. The Flash must find a way to restore time and finally apprehend his worst enemy before all is lost.

programme.title: Teen Titans Go! and DC Super Hero Girls: Mayhem in the Multiverse
programme.desc: The Super Hero Girls and the Teen Titans reluctantly band together to fight a new threat to the universe.

programme.title: The Cinema List: Magical Movies
programme.desc: From Harry Potter to Fantastic Beasts, Ella Enchanted to The Secret Garden. Discover a collection of magical journeys where destiny and wonder collide.

programme.title: The Emoji Movie
programme.desc: Three emojis embark on an epic adventure through a smartphone to save their world from being deleted.

programme.title: The LEGO NINJAGO Movie
programme.desc: Master Wu, as wise-cracking as he is wise, leads a fierce team of secret ninja warriors to defeat the evil warlord Garmadon and save Ninjago City.

programme.title: Over the Hedge
programme.desc: An opportunistic raccoon teaches fellow animals about the edible treasures that the new humans in the neighbourhood conveniently leave outdoors.

programme.title: How to Train Your Dragon
programme.desc: A young Viking with aspirations of becoming a dragon hunter befriends a young dragon himself and learns more about the creatures than he ever assumed.

programme.title: Hotel Transylvania
programme.desc: Dracula, who operates a high-end resort away from the human world, goes into overprotective mode when a boy discovers the resort and falls for the counts teen-aged daughter.

programme.title: Shrek the Third
programme.desc: Shrek is just starting to settle down in his beloved swamp with his wife Fiona, but their mucky bliss doesnt last for long as word arrives that the ogres froggy father-in-law is about to croak. The very last thing Shrek wants is to become King, but with no other heir in sight, it looks like the grumpy green one is destined never to live quietly in the swamp again. A glimmer of hope appears in the form of heir Artie.

programme.title: The Pirates! In an Adventure With Scientists
programme.desc: An inept swashbuckler decides to make an attempt to win the Pirate of the Year Award, and beat his rivals Black Bellamy and Cutlass Liz in a race to plunder the most booty. His journey takes him to Victorian London where the Pirate Captain must choose between winning Pirate of the Year, or helping his crew.

programme.title: Paws of Fury: The Legend of Hank
programme.desc: A down-on-his-luck hound finds himself in a town full of cats who need a hero to defend them from a ruthless villains evil plot. With help from a reluctant trainer, the underdog must assume the role of fearsome samurai and save the day.

programme.title: Barnyard
programme.desc: Otis the cow is a wild-living party animal and just loves to dance until dawn, but then his dad is killed by coyotes, and Otis has to become the responsible leader of the rest of the all-singing, all-dancing farm animals.

programme.title: Smurfs: The Lost Village
programme.desc: With the evil wizard Gargamel hot on their trail, Smurfette, Brainy, Clumsy and Hefty embark on a journey through the Forbidden Forest to find a mysterious village.

programme.title: LEGO DC Super Heroes: The Flash
programme.desc: Reverse-Flash manipulates the Speed Force to put The Flash into a time loop, which forces him to re-live the same day over and over again. The Flash must find a way to restore time and finally apprehend his worst enemy before all is lost.

programme.title: Rugrats Go Wild
programme.desc: The children and their bickering family are stranded on a desert island. Fortunately help is at hand from the Thornberry family, who are visiting the island to film a rare snow leopard. Once again, animal-understanding Eliza saves the day.

programme.title: Dr. Seuss the Lorax
programme.desc: A young boy searches for a way to gain the affections of his dream-girl. In his quest he learns that in order to succeed he must uncover the story of the grumpy but nature-loving Lorax.

programme.title: Spirit: Stallion of the Cimarron
programme.desc: The story of a wild mustang stallion captured by horse traders and sold to a cavalry regiment at a frontier outpost, where a cruel colonel attempts to break the free-spirited horse. However, he escapes in the company of a Native American youth and embarks upon a series of adventures in the harsh and unforgiving times of the Old West.

programme.title: Spirit: Stallion of the Cimarron
programme.desc: The story of a wild mustang stallion captured by horse traders and sold to a cavalry regiment at a frontier outpost, where a cruel colonel attempts to break the free-spirited horse. However, he escapes in the company of a Native American youth and embarks upon a series of adventures in the harsh and unforgiving times of the Old West.

programme.title: Baywatch
programme.desc: When a criminal plot endangers the beach, Mitch Buchannon leads his elite squad of lifeguards on a mission to prove that one doesnt need to wear a badge to save the bay.

programme.title: Nacho Libre
programme.desc: Brother Ignacio is an orphanage chef who cooks up a plan to earn money for the kids by becoming a Mexican wrestling star. First, he must don a leotard.

programme.title: The Cinema List: Saturday Night
programme.desc: To celebrate the release of the film Saturday Night, join the Cinema List as we explore 50 years of hilarious films from the SNL cast - including Waynes World, Bridesmaids and more.

programme.title: The Men Who Stare at Goats
programme.desc: A reporter in Iraq may just have the story of a lifetime when he meets Lyn Cassady, a guy who claims to be a former member of the US Armys New Earth Army, a unit that employs paranormal powers in their missions.

programme.title: Kangaroo Jack
programme.desc: Two childhood friends get caught up in with the mob in New York and find themselves forced to travel to Australia to deliver $50,000. Their trouble really starts when they reach the outback, and a kangaroo bounds away with the cash.

programme.title: My Big Fat Greek Wedding 2
programme.desc: The continuing adventures of the Portokalos family. A follow-up to the 2002 comedy, My Big Fat Greek Wedding.

programme.title: The Holdovers
programme.desc: Forced to spend Christmas break with a handful of students, a curmudgeonly instructor at a New England prep school develops an unlikely bond with a brainy troublemaker and the head cook.

programme.title: Pixels
programme.desc: Video game experts are recruited by the military to fight 1980s-era video game characters whove attacked New York.

programme.title: Mean Girls
programme.desc: New student Cady Heron gets welcomed into the top of the social food chain by an elite group of popular girls called the Plastics, ruled by the conniving queen bee Regina George. However, when Cady makes the major misstep of falling for Reginas ex-boyfriend, she soon finds herself caught in their crosshairs.

programme.title: David Brent: Life on the Road
programme.desc: David Brent is on tour with his band `Forgone Conclusion. However, tickets sales are not enough to keep the band afloat so Brent has to dip into his pension. Meanwhile, he is being filmed for what he believes will be a documentary, like Martin Scorsese did with The Rolling Stones, but it if for a `where are they now style documentary.

programme.title: 13 Going on 30
programme.desc: Jenna is desperate for acceptance at school. After wishing that she was older, she wakes up with a job, a flat and a boyfriend, but is being 30 all its cracked up to be? Jenna discovers she isnt the person she thought shed be when she grew up.

programme.title: Pitch Perfect 2
programme.desc: Now graduating seniors, the Barden Bellas enter an international a cappella competition which no American team has ever won.

programme.title: The Other Guys
programme.desc: While New York detectives Christopher Danson and PK Highsmith wow the city with their heroics, colleagues Allen Gamble and Terry Hoitz are the `other guys. Chained to their desks, forensic accountant Gamble and disgraced cop Hoitz are at each others throats when an unfortunate incident gives them the opportunity to prove themselves.

programme.title: Horrible Bosses
programme.desc: Nick, Dale and Kurt all despise their bosses, but who would be crazy enough to quit their jobs in such poor economic times? The trio drunkenly and hypothetically discuss how to kill their bosses, and before they know it, theyve hired a murder consultant to help them pull off the three deeds.

programme.title: Happy Gilmore
programme.desc: Happy Gilmore is a bad boy ice hockey player who fails to make the grade because he cant skate or control his temper, but he does have a powerful shot and realises he can hit a golf ball 400 yards. When his grans house is repossessed because she never paid tax, he agrees to take up golf to try and win enough money to buy it back, but he cant putt and the golfing establishment arent happy to have him around.

programme.title: Sky Cinema Preview
programme.desc: Previews of the great films now playing on Sky Cinema plus other highlights showing on Sky.

programme.title: Baywatch
programme.desc: When a criminal plot endangers the beach, Mitch Buchannon leads his elite squad of lifeguards on a mission to prove that one doesnt need to wear a badge to save the bay.

programme.title: Nacho Libre
programme.desc: Brother Ignacio is an orphanage chef who cooks up a plan to earn money for the kids by becoming a Mexican wrestling star. First, he must don a leotard.

programme.title: The Cinema List: Saturday Night
programme.desc: To celebrate the release of the film Saturday Night, join the Cinema List as we explore 50 years of hilarious films from the SNL cast - including Waynes World, Bridesmaids and more.

programme.title: The Men Who Stare at Goats
programme.desc: A reporter in Iraq may just have the story of a lifetime when he meets Lyn Cassady, a guy who claims to be a former member of the US Armys New Earth Army, a unit that employs paranormal powers in their missions.

programme.title: Kangaroo Jack
programme.desc: Two childhood friends get caught up in with the mob in New York and find themselves forced to travel to Australia to deliver $50,000. Their trouble really starts when they reach the outback, and a kangaroo bounds away with the cash.

programme.title: My Big Fat Greek Wedding 2
programme.desc: The continuing adventures of the Portokalos family. A follow-up to the 2002 comedy, My Big Fat Greek Wedding.

programme.title: The Holdovers
programme.desc: Forced to spend Christmas break with a handful of students, a curmudgeonly instructor at a New England prep school develops an unlikely bond with a brainy troublemaker and the head cook.

programme.title: Pixels
programme.desc: Video game experts are recruited by the military to fight 1980s-era video game characters whove attacked New York.

programme.title: Mean Girls
programme.desc: New student Cady Heron gets welcomed into the top of the social food chain by an elite group of popular girls called the Plastics, ruled by the conniving queen bee Regina George. However, when Cady makes the major misstep of falling for Reginas ex-boyfriend, she soon finds herself caught in their crosshairs.

programme.title: David Brent: Life on the Road
programme.desc: David Brent is on tour with his band `Forgone Conclusion. However, tickets sales are not enough to keep the band afloat so Brent has to dip into his pension. Meanwhile, he is being filmed for what he believes will be a documentary, like Martin Scorsese did with The Rolling Stones, but it if for a `where are they now style documentary.

programme.title: 13 Going on 30
programme.desc: Jenna is desperate for acceptance at school. After wishing that she was older, she wakes up with a job, a flat and a boyfriend, but is being 30 all its cracked up to be? Jenna discovers she isnt the person she thought shed be when she grew up.

programme.title: Pitch Perfect 2
programme.desc: Now graduating seniors, the Barden Bellas enter an international a cappella competition which no American team has ever won.

programme.title: The Other Guys
programme.desc: While New York detectives Christopher Danson and PK Highsmith wow the city with their heroics, colleagues Allen Gamble and Terry Hoitz are the `other guys. Chained to their desks, forensic accountant Gamble and disgraced cop Hoitz are at each others throats when an unfortunate incident gives them the opportunity to prove themselves.

programme.title: Horrible Bosses
programme.desc: Nick, Dale and Kurt all despise their bosses, but who would be crazy enough to quit their jobs in such poor economic times? The trio drunkenly and hypothetically discuss how to kill their bosses, and before they know it, theyve hired a murder consultant to help them pull off the three deeds.

programme.title: Happy Gilmore
programme.desc: Happy Gilmore is a bad boy ice hockey player who fails to make the grade because he cant skate or control his temper, but he does have a powerful shot and realises he can hit a golf ball 400 yards. When his grans house is repossessed because she never paid tax, he agrees to take up golf to try and win enough money to buy it back, but he cant putt and the golfing establishment arent happy to have him around.

programme.title: Sky Cinema Preview
programme.desc: Previews of the great films now playing on Sky Cinema plus other highlights showing on Sky.

programme.title: The Bridge on the River Kwai
programme.desc: British POWs are ordered by their Japanese captors to construct a bridge of strategic importance and are happy to sabotage and delay the progress until their commanding officers orders them to continue the work unhindered to its completion, but are his actions tantamount to collaborating with the enemy?

programme.title: True Grit
programme.desc: John Wayne won an Oscar here as Rooster Cogburn, a lawman recruited by a teenager seeking revenge on her fathers murderer.

programme.title: Lee
programme.desc: The story of photographer Elizabeth `Lee Miller, a fashion model who became an acclaimed war correspondent for Vogue magazine during World War II.

programme.title: The Boy in the Striped Pyjamas
programme.desc: When his fathers job results in a family move to the countryside, young German boy Bruno misses his old friends. Roaming the grounds of the large country house he now calls home, he discovers the huge fenced facility that his dad Ralf, a Nazi officer, now manages. Approaching it, Bruno meets Shmuel, a fellow youngster on the other side of the barbed wire, wearing what appears to be a pair of pyjamas.

programme.title: Schindlers List
programme.desc: True story of German businessman Oskar Schindlers efforts to save his Jewish workers from being exterminated in Nazi concentration camps.

programme.title: There Will Be Blood
programme.desc: Ruthless silver miner, turned oil prospector, Daniel Plainview moves to oil-rich California. Using his adopted son HW to project a trustworthy, family-man image, Plainview cons local landowners into selling him their valuable properties for a pittance. However, local preacher Eli Sunday suspects Plainviews motives and intentions, starting a slow-burning feud that threatens both their lives.

programme.title: Dreamgirls
programme.desc: Following the adventures of The Dreamettes, an all-girl singing group. Theyre going nowhere fast until they meet fast-talking car salesman-come-manager who has ambitions to make a fortune selling black music to a white audience. He persuades them to become backing singers for James `Thunder Early, but the larger-than-life lead singer Effie White must step out of the spotlight in favour of the more image-friendly Deena Jones.

programme.title: Grease
programme.desc: High-spirited musical set in 1950s America, in which a girl and boy who met on the beach are unexpectedly reunited at high school. She cannot understand how different he has become. Can the leather-clad, tough-talking leader of the T-Birds really be the same person? Perhaps her new friends, the Pink Ladies, can help her win back his heart?

programme.title: Grease 2
programme.desc: When Rydell new boy Michael meets hot Pink Lady Stephanie he is instantly smitten, but Michaels a geek and top T-Bird Johnny wants Stephanie back. Will an image change help him get the girl?

programme.title: Scent of a Woman
programme.desc: Frank is a retired Lt Col in the US army. Hes blind and impossible to get along with. Charlie is at school and is looking forward to going to university; to help pay for a trip home for Christmas, he agrees to look after Frank over thanksgiving. Franks niece says this will be easy money, but she didnt reckon on Frank spending his Thanksgiving in New York.

programme.title: Flashdance
programme.desc: A young female welder dreams of becoming a professional dancer and struggles against all the odds to realise her dream. However, in her effort to succeed, she discovers that getting to the top is far from easy. Giorgio Moroders composition `Flashdance (What a Feeling), sung by Irene Cara, won an Academy Award for Best Original Song.

programme.title: Goosebumps 2
programme.desc: Best friends Sonny and Sam meet Slappy, a mischievous dummy who brings his ghoulish friends back to life -- just in time for Halloween. As the town becomes overrun with monsters, the boys join forces to save Sonnys mom and foil Slappys wicked plan.

programme.title: The Wiz
programme.desc: In this version of the classic story - based on the smash Broadway musical - Dorothy is a shy 24-year-old Harlem kindergarten teacher who is brought by a snowstorm to the mysterious Land of Oz, a sprawling, decaying, nightmarish, and dangerous megalopolis that resembles the physical characteristics of New York City.

programme.title: The Tiger Rising
programme.desc: When a boy discovers a caged tiger in the woods near his home, his imagination runs wild as his life begins to change in unexpected ways.

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
programme.desc: Four unlikely warriors rise from the sewers and join forces with fearless reporter April ONeil to save New York from Shredder and his evil minions.

programme.title: Mr Beans Holiday
programme.desc: Mr Bean is going on holiday to the south of France, looking for a quiet and sunny trip in the Riviera. However, his trip doesnt go as smoothly as he expected when he has to face a series of misunderstandings and totally unfortunate coincidences. Eventually, Mr Bean will end up spoiling the last film of the snobbish director Carson Clay and appearing by accident at the Cannes Film Festival.

programme.title: Peter Rabbit 2
programme.desc: Despite his efforts, Peter cant seem to shake his reputation for mischief among the other rabbits. Once he adventures out of the garden Peter finds himself in a world where mischief is appreciated, but soon his family come to bring him home.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: A magic portal transports the little blue people to Manhattan, where they must find a way back to their village before evil wizard Gargamel can find them.

programme.title: The Smurfs 2
programme.desc: Papa and the rest of the Smurfs reunite with their human friends to rescue Smurfette from the clutches of evil wizard Gargamel.

programme.title: Johnny English
programme.desc: Spoof spy caper with the eponymous, blundering hero attempting to recover the crown jewels and save Britain from an evil mastermind when all the other agents are killed. Promoted from lowly pen pusher to super spy, Johnny English is baffled when clues lead to respected entrepreneur Pascal Sauvage, but could the enigmatic Lorna hold the key to the mystery?

programme.title: Finding Neverland
programme.desc: Its London in 1904, and writer JM Barrie is inspired by a family he meets, mother Sylvia and her four children, Peter, Jack, George and Michael. From the time he spends with them, he writes the famous childrens novel `Peter Pan.

programme.title: Small Soldiers
programme.desc: A toy company develops action-figure soldiers whose realistic fighting capabilities cause mayhem for a toy-shop owner and his family. Unaware of their military prowess, the shop keeper takes delivery of the soldiers, who break free from their packaging to attack their Gorgonite enemies. When the Gorgonites communicate with the shop keepers son, the humans find themselves under siege.

programme.title: Snow White and the Huntsman
programme.desc: In a twist to the fairy tale, the Huntsman ordered to take Snow White into the woods to be killed winds up becoming her protector and mentor in a quest to vanquish the Evil Queen.

programme.title: The Huntsman: Winters War
programme.desc: A huntsman and a fellow warrior help an ice queen battle the evil sister who betrayed her.

programme.title: Ella Enchanted
programme.desc: As a child, Ella is put under a spell which makes her constantly obedient. When her evil stepsister starts using the spell against her, Ella must rid herself of the curse if she is to marry the handsome prince, especially as the regent, Sir Edgar, has his own plans for heir to the throne.

programme.title: Ella Enchanted

programme.title: Ella Enchanted
programme.desc: As a child, Ella is put under a spell which makes her constantly obedient. When her evil stepsister starts using the spell against her, Ella must rid herself of the curse if she is to marry the handsome prince, especially as the regent, Sir Edgar, has his own plans for heir to the throne.

programme.title: Galaxy Quest
programme.desc: The stars of a 1970s sci-fi show - now scraping a living through re-runs and sci-fi conventions - are beamed aboard an alien spacecraft. Believing the casts heroic on-screen dramas are historical documents of real-life adventures, the band of aliens turn to the ailing celebrities for help in their quest to overcome the oppressive regime in their solar system.

programme.title: Parenthood
programme.desc: An over-protective dad, determined to do a better job than his own distant father, anxiously dotes on his troubled eight-year-old son. His brother, meanwhile, strives to mould his toddler daughter into an academic high-flyer, and his sister struggles with two rebellious, angst-ridden teenagers.

programme.title: A League of Their Own
programme.desc: Based on a true story, this film, set during World War II, tells the story of the all-female baseball league that was started while the American men were away fighting in Europe. After a team of potential players has been recruited, former player Jimmy Dugan coaches the girls and prepares them for the World Series.

programme.title: Kingpin
programme.desc: An ex-professional bowler and his talented Amish protege hustle their way across the country to a big-money tournament.

programme.title: A Night at the Roxbury
programme.desc: Two sorry siblings dance their way through the Los Angeles club scene while trying to open up their own establishment.

programme.title: Alfie
programme.desc: In London during the swinging sixties, a promiscuous Cockney lad who lacks purpose or direction habitually seduces women and then moves on. When one of his girlfriends becomes pregnant, he refuses to marry her, preferring instead to carry on with more conquests, but eventually something happens which forces him to reconsider his shallow existence.

programme.title: Singin in the Rain
programme.desc: When the transition is being made from silent films to `talkies, everyone has trouble adapting. Don and Lina have been cast repeatedly as a romantic couple, but when their latest film is remade into a musical, only Don has the voice for the new singing part. After a lot of practise with a diction coach, Lina still sounds terrible, and Kathy, a bright young aspiring actress, is hired to record over her voice.

programme.title: Forces of Nature
programme.desc: A writer is trying to fly from New York to Savannah, Georgia, where he is due to be married in two days time. However, the plane crashes during take-off and the writer inadvertently saves the life of one of his fellow passengers, a free-spirited woman. She then accompanies him as he tries to continue his journey by rental car, train and bus - but he is beset by one disaster after another.

programme.title: Happy Gilmore
programme.desc: Happy Gilmore is a bad boy ice hockey player who fails to make the grade because he cant skate or control his temper, but he does have a powerful shot and realises he can hit a golf ball 400 yards. When his grans house is repossessed because she never paid tax, he agrees to take up golf to try and win enough money to buy it back, but he cant putt and the golfing establishment arent happy to have him around.

programme.title: Dumb and Dumber
programme.desc: A pair of idiotic friends set off on a madcap journey to return a briefcase to its owner. However, they are blissfully unaware that the case contains a large amount of ransom money for the owners kidnapped husband. Their trip is soon fraught with disaster, especially when the kidnappers begin to pursue them across the country with the aim of grabbing the cash.

programme.title: Kingpin
programme.desc: An ex-professional bowler and his talented Amish protege hustle their way across the country to a big-money tournament.

programme.title: A Night at the Roxbury
programme.desc: Two sorry siblings dance their way through the Los Angeles club scene while trying to open up their own establishment.

programme.title: Twins
programme.desc: Two very different twin brothers were born as a result of a genetic experiment. Following their birth, the flawless Julius grew up on a paradise island, while the less-than-perfect Vincent was sent to an orphanage. Now, many years later, Vincent is a thief and con man with huge debts. What will Julius think when he searches for his long-lost twin and finds him in jail?

programme.title: Brewsters Millions
programme.desc: Montgomery Brewster is a low-league baseball player who suddenly finds out that a distant relative has left him $300 million. However, theres a catch: he has to waste $30 million in just 30 days without anyone knowing hes doing it.

programme.title: The Amazing Spider-Man 2
programme.desc: The emergence of a powerful new villain and the return of an old friend bring Peter Parker to the realization that all his enemies have one thing in common: Oscorp. Based on Marvel Comics characters.

programme.title: Madame Web
programme.desc: After showing signs of clairvoyance, New York City paramedic Cassandra Webb must confront revelations about her past and protect three young women from a mysterious adversary who wants them dead.

programme.title: Venom: The Last Dance
programme.desc: Eddie Brock and Venom must make a devastating decision as theyre pursued by a mysterious military man and alien monsters from Venoms home world.

programme.title: Spider-Man
programme.desc: Adaptation of the adventures of the swinging comic-strip hero. A shy student becomes a crime fighter after a bite from a mutant spider, during a school outing, gives him extraordinary powers. As he comes to terms with his new-found abilities, he is also forced to contend with a maniac villain known as the Green Goblin.

programme.title: Spider-Man 2
programme.desc: The comic book web-slinger returns for a blockbusting sequel. Crime-fighting has cost Peter Parker his best friend and his true love Mary Jane. However, just as he quits as Spider-Man, New York comes under threat from Dr Octopus, a metal-tentacled madman. Peter has no choice but to swing back into action.

programme.title: Spider-Man 3
programme.desc: Life is sweet for Peter Parker, MJ loves him, her career is taking off and Spidey-mania is sweeping New York. However, when an alien parasite bonds to his suit, its not long before the good times and Spidey turn bad. While his ugly ego is taking centre stage, MJ is dumped from her Broadway show, Harry remembers Spider-Mans role in his fathers death, and Peter is consumed by revenge.

programme.title: The Amazing Spider-Man
programme.desc: Peter Parker finds a clue that might help him understand why his parents disappeared when he was young. His path puts him on a collision course with Dr. Curt Connors, his fathers former partner.

programme.title: The Amazing Spider-Man 2
programme.desc: The emergence of a powerful new villain and the return of an old friend bring Peter Parker to the realization that all his enemies have one thing in common: Oscorp. Based on Marvel Comics characters.

programme.title: Spider-Man
programme.desc: Adaptation of the adventures of the swinging comic-strip hero. A shy student becomes a crime fighter after a bite from a mutant spider, during a school outing, gives him extraordinary powers. As he comes to terms with his new-found abilities, he is also forced to contend with a maniac villain known as the Green Goblin.

programme.title: Spider-Man 2
programme.desc: The comic book web-slinger returns for a blockbusting sequel. Crime-fighting has cost Peter Parker his best friend and his true love Mary Jane. However, just as he quits as Spider-Man, New York comes under threat from Dr Octopus, a metal-tentacled madman. Peter has no choice but to swing back into action.

programme.title: Men in Black
programme.desc: The secretive Men in Black are agents charged with regulating the aliens who have settled on Earth and ensure that they remain undetected. New recruit J and his partner K must find and stop an intergalactic terrorist bent on assassinating two ambassadors from opposing galaxies before they can make peace.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Men in Black II
programme.desc: Sequel to the sci-fi comedy about a top secret government task force set up to deal with unruly extraterrestrials. programme.title: Hollow Man
programme.desc: After years of experimentation, brilliant but arrogant scientist Sebastian Caine has discovered a way to make matter invisible. Determined to achieve the ultimate breakthrough, Caine pushes his team to move to the next phase - using himself as the subject. The test is a success, but when the process cant be reversed, Caine seems doomed to a future without flesh.

programme.title: Cinema List: Thrilling Thriller
programme.desc: Send your heart racing with these masterful thrillers creating tension so thick you could cut it, from 70s hit `The China Syndrome to M Night Shyamalans 2024 blockbuster `Trap.

programme.title: Friday the 13th, Part II
programme.desc: Jason returns to avenge the death of his decapitated mother with a pitchfork and a thirst for blood. Teenagers at a nearby camp fall prey to the killer in the woods in this hillbilly horror flick.

programme.title: Friday the 13th - Part III
programme.desc: Jason is still on the loose. While the hunt for him continues, another group of teenagers arrive at Lake Crystal. Among them is Chris, who is troubled by visions from the past where she was attacked in the woods by a deformed monster, only to awake safe in her bed. Determined to face her demons, she and her boyfriend Rick are among the group partying at the Lake but Jason is ready to exact revenge.

programme.title: The Ring
programme.desc: US remake of the cult Japanese chiller about a journalist who faces a race against time when she investigates the legend of a strange videotape which allegedly claims the life of the viewer one week after watching it.

programme.title: Psycho
programme.desc: Gus Van Sants remake of the Hitchcock classic about an embezzler who checks into a remote motel run by a psychopath. While remaining faithful to the original, the modern setting and slightly more explicit shots than the censor would allow in Hitchcocks day make this a fascinating exercise that compares favourably to the original.

programme.title: Ouija
programme.desc: A group of friends must confront their most terrifying fears when they awaken the dark powers of an ancient spirit board.

programme.title: Ouija: Origin of Evil
programme.desc: A seance scam leads to terror when an evil spirit possesses a widows youngest daughter in 1967 Los Angeles.

programme.title: The Invisible Man
programme.desc: After staging his own suicide, a crazed scientist uses his power to become invisible to stalk and terrorise his ex-girlfriend. When the police refuse to believe her story, she decides to take matters into her own hands and fight back.

programme.title: Zombieland
programme.desc: Columbus and Tallahassee have orchestrated a way to survive a world overrun by zombies. With only fear keeping the `big wuss Columbus alive, Tallahassee wants to eradicate the `last Twinkie on Earth. The duo join forces with Wichita and Little Rock who have a style and tact of their own when it comes to dealing with the flesh-eating chaos.

programme.title: Cloverfield
programme.desc: A leaving party for New Yorker Rob Hawkins is rudely interrupted by the arrival of an unwelcome guest, something that has a penchant for smashing up skyscrapers, playing football with the Statue of Libertys head and handpicking humans as snacks.

programme.title: Nosferatu
programme.desc: A new bride is left under the care of friends when her husband travels to Transylvania for a meeting with Count Orlok. Plagued by horrific visions and an increasing sense of dread, she soon encounters an evil force thats far beyond her control.

programme.title: Psycho
programme.desc: Gus Van Sants remake of the Hitchcock classic about an embezzler who checks into a remote motel run by a psychopath. While remaining faithful to the original, the modern setting and slightly more explicit shots than the censor would allow in Hitchcocks day make this a fascinating exercise that compares favourably to the original.

programme.title: Bram Stokers Dracula
programme.desc: Retelling of the classic horror tale about Count Dracula, a 15th-century prince who is condemned to live off the blood of the living for eternity. Young lawyer Jonathan Harker is sent to Draculas castle to finalise a land deal, but when the Count sees a photo of Harkers fiancee, Mina, the image of his dead wife, he imprisons him and sets off for London to track her down.

programme.title: Die Alone
programme.desc: A young man with amnesia bands together with a rugged survivalist after a devastating virus causes a zombie-like outbreak.

programme.title: The Da Vinci Code
programme.desc: The curator of the Louvre museum is murdered, leaving behind a chain of obscure clues to a world-changing secret. Cryptologist Sophie Neveu and Harvard professor Robert Langdon embark on a race against time to uncover the precious truth before it falls into the wrong hands.

programme.title: Angels and Demons
programme.desc: Having ruffled the feathers of the Catholic Church with his controversial investigations into Christian history, Harvard symbologist Robert Langdon is surprised to be approached by the Popes emissaries for help. Following the Popes recent death, the four candidates most likely to take the pontiffs place have been kidnapped by a mysterious organisation known as the Illuminati.

programme.desc: Alison attempts to rescue a squirrel monkey, who proves to be something of an escape artist, and the newly arrived orangutan youngster Kayan meets with Bulu Mata for the first time.

programme.title: Monkey Life
programme.desc: The park comes to the aid of two marmosets, leaving Alison shocked by the condition of the male, while Louisa reaches out the foot of friendship to male crush Matty the capuchin.

programme.title: Dogs With Extraordinary Jobs
programme.desc: A Great Dane assists a 13-year-old girl living with a limiting condition and a Border Collie helps the California Task Force search for survivors. Meanwhile Ruger sniffs out illegal poachers in Zambia.

programme.title: Wildest New Zealand
programme.desc: At the waters edge a brave group of male penguins gather, preparing to make the dangerous journey ashore. With many threats ahead, there is safety in number and these petite penguins have important business to attend. Its time to breed and they must find a burrow before the females arrive.

programme.title: The Living Beach
programme.desc: Throughout the Hawaiian islands, natural forces of creation and destruction can be observed in real-time as they work to shape the living beach.

programme.title: Hope for Wildlife
programme.desc: A handful of weasels are finally ready for release into the wild, a daring volunteer goes offshore to rescue an injured eagle and a gull flies free.

programme.title: Killer Couples
programme.desc: "Killer Couples" is in the same vein of the long-running true-crime series "Snapped," which tells stories of people who commit murder or attempt murder, but with a focus on couples who commit crimes. Using re-creations and firsthand accounts, each episode digs into a case, telling the story of the couples romance, how the relationship evolved from love to manipulation, and what ultimately led the couple to commit the crime. The stories range from teenage lovers who go on a multistate crime spree to lesbian lovers who want to eliminate one of their husbands.
