programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Shopping from home.

programme.title: Great American Railroad Journeys
programme.desc: Michael Portillo reaches Colorado, where he follows in the footsteps of 19th-century East Coast dudes, who came to experience the cowboy life. At Bents Old Fort, Michael is transported back to the Mexican American War of 1848.

programme.title: Great American Railroad Journeys
programme.sub-title: Santa Fe, New Mexico, to The Grand Canyon
programme.desc: Michael Portillo arrives in the state capital of New Mexico, once the capital of the Spanish Kingdom of New Mexico. He explores the beautiful colonial architecture of the city and is privileged to be invited to visit a Native American pueblo.

programme.title: Great Indian Railway Journeys
programme.desc: Michael embarks on a rail journey from the Thar Desert in Rajasthan to the Indian capital, taking in desert landscapes and dazzling historic palaces. From Jodhpur, Michael strikes out into the desert, taking a camel ride to a village where life has changed little in centuries, before embarking on the Jaipur-Agra-Delhi `Golden Triangle tour, Indias must-do itinerary in 1913 as today.

programme.title: Trawlermen
programme.desc: Offshore fishing, the most dangerous job in Britain, has a problem when it comes to getting new recruits, but 17-year-old Ryan wants to take up the challenge. He sets out on his first trip on one of the most successful pair of trawlers in Britain as they head into the rough Norwegian waters looking for cod and haddock. If he doesnt impress skipper Kevin West, hell be looking for a new job when they come back.

programme.title: Trawlermen
programme.desc: Jimmy, skipper of the prawn boat Amity, is 100 miles offshore fishing in one of the most hazardous areas of the North Sea - the Devils Hole. The engines which bring in his nets are on the brink of failing - if they stop hell have to cut loose his nets and return to port with no prawns and no pay. Eighty miles away, new boy Ryan is desperate to impress skipper Kevin West, but time is running out to show hes tough enough.

programme.title: Trawlermen
programme.desc: Skipper Jimmy Buchan takes his prawn trawler Amity south to avoid a ferocious storm. Mindful of the recent sinking of a local boat with the loss of all on board, he fears for the safety of his crew. Meahwhile, Skipper John Buchan is full of optimism when he sets off for haddock, but then his trawler Ocean Venture gets caught in a force nine gale.

programme.title: Bangers and Cash
programme.desc: Derek, with help from the Mathewson clan, drag a mini pickup out of the barn where its been for 20 years, and a 350cc Douglas Mark V motorbike from 1950 goes under the hammer.

programme.title: Bangers and Cash
programme.desc: Four VW camper vans pitch up at the auction house looking for a new home and Derek picks up an Austin 16 that goes like stink and has some unusual modern modifications.

programme.title: Bangers and Cash: Restoring Classics
programme.desc: Derek points the team towards one of his favourite motors - a 1983 Daimler Double Six. And a Triumph 2000 is given a modern day makeover under the bonnet.

programme.title: Flipping Bangers
programme.desc: Will and Gus buy a Porsche 923 with a cracked interior, bad paintwork and ripped seats. This driving legend is well past its best, but can they still turn a profit?

programme.title: Frozen Planet
programme.desc: Winter is the greatest test for life in the polar regions, as temperatures plummet to 70 below and winds reach 200kph. Only a few remarkable survivors gamble on remaining in these extreme conditions. In the Arctic, a female polar bear treks into the mountains to give birth. Out on the frozen ocean, the entire population of the worlds spectacled eider ducks braves the winter in a giant ice hole.

programme.title: Frozen Planet
programme.desc: Revealing the extraordinary riches and wonders of the polar regions that have kept people visiting them for thousands of years. Today, their survival relies on a combination of ancient wisdom and cutting-edge science. Most Arctic people live in Siberia, either in cities like Norilsk - the coldest city on earth - or out on the tundra, where tribes like the Dogan survive by herding reindeer.

programme.title: Life
programme.desc: In nature, living long enough to breed is a monumental struggle, and many animals and plants go to extremes to give themselves a chance. Three brother cheetahs band together to bring down a huge ostrich, bottle-nosed dolphins trap fish in a ring of mud, the strawberry frog carries a tadpole high into a tree and drops it in a water-filled bromeliad, and chinstrap penguins undertake a journey through the broken ice to get out to sea.

programme.title: Life
programme.desc: A look at how reptiles and amphibians conquer their shortcomings through amazing innovation. Extreme slow-motion shows how a Jesus Christ lizard runs on water, and how a chameleon fires an extendible tongue at its prey with unfailing accuracy. The camera also follows a Niuean sea snake, which avoids predators by swimming to an air bubble at the end of an underwater tunnel, and later Komodo dragons hunt a huge water-buffalo.

programme.title: Ireland with Simon Reeve
programme.desc: Starting at the spectacular Giants Causeway in Northern Ireland, Simon travels down the east coast to the great and rapidly changing cities of Belfast and Dublin. He ends his journey in the stunning Wicklow Mountains.

programme.title: Flipping Bangers
programme.desc: Will and Gus buy a Porsche 923 with a cracked interior, bad paintwork and ripped seats. This driving legend is well past its best, but can they still turn a profit?

programme.title: Bangers and Cash: Restoring Classics
programme.desc: Derek points the team towards one of his favourite motors - a 1983 Daimler Double Six. And a Triumph 2000 is given a modern day makeover under the bonnet.

programme.title: Bangers and Cash: Restoring Classics
programme.desc: Can the team finally smell profit when they sniff out a bargain Porsche? A DIY job on a Fiat should also keep the accountant happy but will it go to plan?

programme.title: Bangers and Cash: Restoring Classics
programme.desc: The teams first purchase is a 1972 VW Fastback, and the second project sees them pick up a 40-year-old police bike.

programme.title: Bangers and Cash: Restoring Classics
programme.desc: The Bangers team cant believe their luck when a 1970s family-favourite, a Volvo 144, rolls through Mathewson with just 15,000 miles on the clock.

programme.title: Bangers and Cash: Restoring Classics
programme.desc: The team fall for a Subaru Pick-up, which has all the Mathewsons in agreement. But will it all come crashing down when picking up parts proves tricky?

programme.title: Bangers and Cash: Restoring Classics
programme.desc: A 1973 Ford Escort Mexico is the teams most expensive purchase to date. To save some cash Derek helps on their second buy - a 1968 Riley Kestrel.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Shopping from home.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Shopping from home.

programme.title: Monsoon Shootout
programme.desc: Shiva, a rookie cop, lives out two possible futures after a confrontation with a notorious hit man.

programme.title: Meri Jung
programme.desc: The story of Deepak Verma, an innocent man who is framed for a murder and is wrongly sentenced to death. His son grows up to become lawyer and wants to avenge his fathers death.

programme.title: Lootcase
programme.desc: Nandan Kumar comes across a suitcase and discovers it is full of cash. He knows nothing about who it belongs to, where its from, or how it got there. Nandan has to decide whether or not to take it or leave it.

programme.title: Hasee Toh Phasee
programme.desc: Shes smart, but shes also quirky, geeky and a magnet for trouble. And, thats exactly what makes Nikhil fall for his fiancees sister, Meeta. With so many hurdles, their love seems set for disaster.

programme.title: Band Baaja Baaraat
programme.desc: Shruti and Bittoo, two graduates from Delhi, reluctantly enter the business world together by creating a wedding planning enterprise.

programme.title: Kapoor and Sons
programme.desc: Brothers Arjun and Rahul return home to visit their ailing grandfather. Amidst numerous ongoing family problems, emotions get intensified when a girl causes a rift between the two.

programme.title: Baghban
programme.desc: Raj Malhotra and his wife Pooja have raised a family of four sons who are now nicely settled in their respective professions, but when Raj and Pooja decide to retire, none of their sons are willing to take care of them.

programme.title: Ishaqzaade
programme.desc: A story of two people who were born to hate but destined to love.

programme.title: The Ghazi Attack
programme.desc: In 1971, an Indian Naval submarine, S21, intercepts a Pakistani submarine, PNS Ghazi, in its water during a routine surveillance and thwarts its mission of destroying INS Vikrant.

programme.title: Jhanak
